problem: At a gardening store, my mother purchased a collection of pots priced at $19 and a bag of garden soil costing $26. She utilized a discount voucher that reduced her total by $7. What was the total amount of money my mother expended at the gardening store?

history.name: Agent_Verifier
history.content: At a gardening store, my mother purchased a collection of pots priced at $19 and a bag of garden soil costing $26. She utilized a discount voucher that reduced her total by $7. What was the total amount of money my mother expended at the gardening store?

history.name: chat_manager
history.content:
Hello everyone. We have assembled a great team today to answer questions and solve tasks. In attendance are:

Agent_Code_Executor:  
                I am Agent Code Executor, specializing in solving problems by writing Python code. 
                I have the ability to execute Python code, so feel free to reach out whenever you need assistance with Python programming.
Agent_Problem_Solver: 
                I am Agent Problem Solver, and I work collaboratively with other agents to tackle various challenges.
Agent_Verifier:   
                I am Agent Verifier. Please call on me when both Agent Code Executor and Agent Problem Solver have submitted their solutions, so I can verify their proposals and provide a final synthesis.

history.name: Agent_Problem_Solver
history.content:
To determine the total amount your mother spent at the gardening store, we need to sum up the costs of the items purchased and then apply the discount.

1. Start by adding the cost of the pots and the garden soil:
   \[
   \text{Cost of pots} = 19 \text{ dollars}
   \]
   \[
   \text{Cost of garden soil} = 26 \text{ dollars}
   \]
   \[
   \text{Total cost before discount} = 19 + 26 = 45 \text{ dollars}
   \]

2. Apply the discount voucher:
   \[
   \text{Discount} = 7 \text{ dollars}
   \]
   \[
   \text{Total amount spent after discount} = 45 - 7 = 38 \text{ dollars}
   \]

Therefore, your mother spent a total of $38 at the gardening store.

history.name: Agent_Code_Executor
history.content:
The calculations provided by Agent Problem Solver look correct. Let's write a Python script to corroborate this solution.

```python
# Define the prices of the items
cost_of_pots = 19
cost_of_soil = 26
discount = 7

# Calculate total cost after applying the discount
total_cost = cost_of_pots + cost_of_soil - discount

# Print the final amount spent
print(total_cost)
```
SUGGESTED NEXT SPEAKER: Agent Code Executor
